words.source: H1696 wayyiqtol 3ms Piel of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'spake', ESV 'spoke', NASB 'spoke'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H3651 adv. ken 'so, thus'; KJV 'so', ESV 'thus', NASB 'accordingly'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H1121 n.mp bene 'sons, children' in construct; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H3808 conj. + neg. particle lo 'not'; KJV 'but', ESV 'but', NASB 'but'
H8085 Qal perf. 3cp of שָׁמַע 'to hear, listen'; KJV 'hearkened not', ESV 'did not listen', NASB 'did not listen'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H7115 prep. min + n.ms qotser 'shortness, impatience'; KJV 'for anguish of', ESV 'because of their broken', NASB 'because of their despondency'

H7307 n.fs ruach 'spirit, breath, wind'; idiom qotser ruach = 'shortness of spirit', i.e. impatience, despair, crushed spirit; KJV 'spirit', ESV 'spirit', NASB 'spirit' (NASB 'despondency', ESV 'broken spirit')
H5656 conj. + prep. min + n.fs ʿavodah 'work, service, bondage'; KJV 'cruel bondage', ESV 'hard slavery', NASB 'harsh labors'
H7186 adj.fs qashah 'hard, severe, harsh'; KJV 'cruel', ESV 'hard', NASB 'harsh'
